content: Failed to connect to MySQL: Mike Dowell - Faculty Profile Home Faculty Directory Profile Update Your Profile Directory FAQs PACT Login Give Feedback Mike Dowell Associate Professor Mike Dowell Associate Professor Academic Appointment(s)AdministrationDepartment of Computer ScienceSchool of Computer and Cyber SciencesDepartment of Computer Science MDOWELL@augusta.edu (706) 729-1461 UH 127 Personal Website General Credentials Instruction Scholarship Service Education Ph.D., Computer Engineering, General University of South Carolina -, 1995 MS, Computer Engineering, General University of South Carolina -, 1987 BEE, Electrical and Electronics Engineering University of South Carolina -, 1985 Courses Taught Most Recent Academic Year CSCI 3400 Data Structures CSCI 1302 Principles of Comp Program II Teaching Interests My teaching interests center on helping students build strong problem-solving and programming foundations through courses like CS2 and Data Structures. I enjoy guiding students to think critically about algorithm design, efficiency, and software organization. I also value connecting these skills to lower-level concepts in assembly and digital logic to deepen their understanding of how software interacts with hardware.
